Package dat.backend.model.persistence

Class MaterialMapper

java.lang.Object
dat.backend.model.persistence.MaterialMapper
public class MaterialMapper extends Object
This class contains all the methods used to retrieve and alter materials from the database. All methods in this class is static.
Author:
MrJustMeDahl

  • Method Details

    • getAllPosts

      static List<Post> getAllPosts(ConnectionPool connectionPool) throws DatabaseException
      This method retrieves all the posts from the database. The list is sorted by description and length in the end.
      Parameters:
      connectionPool - required to establish connection to the database.
      Returns:
      List of Post objects
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - is thrown if connection to database fails.

    • getAllRafters

      Returns:
      List of Rafter objects

    • getAllMaterialTypes

      static List<String> getAllMaterialTypes(ConnectionPool connectionPool) throws DatabaseException
      This method retrieves a list of all material types from the database.
      Parameters:
      connectionPool - required to establish connection to the database.
      Returns:
      List of strings with material types.
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - Is thrown if any SQL exception is thrown.

    • getAllMaterialFunctions

      static List<String> getAllMaterialFunctions(ConnectionPool connectionPool) throws DatabaseException
      This method retrieves a list of all material build functions from the databse.
      Parameters:
      connectionPool - required to establish connection to the database.
      Returns:
      List of strings with material build functions.
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - Is thrown if any SQL exception is thrown.

    • updateMaterial

      static boolean updateMaterial(int materialId, double newPrice, String newDescription, ConnectionPool connectionPool) throws DatabaseException
      This method updates the material in DB, from updatematerial.jsp, with inputs from an admin
      Parameters:
      materialId - the selected material in updatematerial.jsp
      newPrice - changeable for admin via inputform
      newDescription - changeable for admin via inputform
      connectionPool - required to establish connection to the database.
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - is thrown if connection to database fails.

    • createNewMaterial

      static int createNewMaterial(String description, int materialType, int materialFunction, double price, ConnectionPool connectionPool) throws DatabaseException
      This method creates a new materialtype in the DB, by filling out 4 forms, the admin can add a new item to the material DB
      Parameters:
      description - The description of the product, this is added as a String, from a userinput
      materialType - The Type of material, added as an int, via a dropdown from the user
      materialFunction - The Function this pruduct has, also saved as an int, also from a dropdown
      price - The indicative price. Added as a double, from a userinput
      connectionPool - required to establish connection to the database.
      Returns:
      the newly created materialId
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - is thrown if connection to database fails.

    • addLength

      static int addLength(int materialId, int length, ConnectionPool connectionPool) throws DatabaseException
      The addLength method is part of creating a new materialvariant, after the type is created in the createNewMaterial method, the materialId is rturned, and used here to add a length and therefor creates a new material
      Parameters:
      materialId - is used to combine the new materialtype, with the new material. if no new material is created, then it takes the materialId from the existing material insted
      length - the length of the new material, an input from the user, stored as an int.
      connectionPool - required to establish connection to the database.
      Returns:
      the newly created materialvariantId
      Throws:
      DatabaseException

    • getAllSheathing

      static List<Sheathing> getAllSheathing(ConnectionPool connectionPool) throws DatabaseException
      This method retrieves all the sheathings from the database. The list is sorted by description and length in the end.
      Parameters:
      connectionPool - required to establish connection to the database.
      Returns:
      List of Sheathing objects
      Throws:
